pests.name: aphids
pests.remedy: Use neem oil or insecticidal soap spray.

pests.name: whiteflies
pests.remedy: Use yellow sticky traps and natural predators.

pests.name: mites
pests.remedy: Spray water and introduce predatory mites.

pests.name: bollworm
pests.remedy: Use pheromone traps and BT spray.
